caption:
A few personal photos today to say ‘thank you’ to Mum and the children for all their support, love + modelling duties! 😉 It doesn’t go unnoticed and we feel incredibly lucky to have you in our lives.

Anyone else enlist the children - and/or their parents - to help support their brand? 💫

Running a business; especially a family business can be all consuming at times. Balance Me is another ‘baby’ and super demanding; in particular right now. The #worklife struggle/juggle is real and we don’t always get the #balance quite right. But they never judge or complain; rather help keep us sane. And ensure we laugh and switch off as much as we can. 

A special shout out to Maia and Trixie because your model duties are often, and you don’t charge us fees! Scroll to the end to see them in action!

Happy Mother’s Day! 🫶🌸

#mothersday #mothersanddaughters #motherhood #balanceme
